divs: sighting detailsi was at a middle school football game when me and a few other people noticed the slowly moving triangle move over us with only a little hum of noise. as it moved over the school and out of our veiw i stood up to follow it when a small blue\gray puff of smoke swirled out of the back and over the object. it had 3 lights at each point, not blinking just solid light and a another smaller light in the middle. the object made no sudden movements, it just moved foward slowly.when i saw it i first thought it was tr3b but i thought the lights were far to small and bright to be a tr3b.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Skaneateles
This sighting has never been favorited.
